entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Haldimand County
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:32 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 1:33 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -4.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -5.0°C
Wind: NE 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle changing to periods of drizzle this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
